alert.note: Alert for Central Colorado River Basin; Elkhead and Park Mountains; Flat Tops; Upper Yampa River Basin (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 24 at 7:12PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...SNOW SQUALL... HAZARDS...A snow squall accompanied by winds of up to 30 MPH which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than a quarter of a mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 712 PM MDT, a snow squall was along a line extending from 7 miles southeast of Yampa to 17 miles north of Paonia and moving east at 30 MPH. THIS SQUALL WILL BE NEAR... Marble around 755 PM MDT. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 in Colorado between mile markers 105 and 176. Colorado 82 between mile markers 1 and 43. Colorado 131 between mile markers 1 and 40. Colorado 133 between mile markers 29 and 68. Colorado 134 between mile markers 1 and 10. SAFETY INFO... Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this squall. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads may lead to accidents. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&

area.areaDesc: Central Colorado River Basin; Elkhead and Park Mountains; Flat Tops; Upper Yampa River Basin
